# DashboardX - AI Agent Platform

## Project Overview
DashboardX is an enterprise AI agent platform that provides intelligent voice agents, chat bots, AI avatars, and RAG-powered workflow automation.

## Core Features
- **Voice Agents**: AI-powered voice agents for calls, scheduling, and surveys.
- **Chat Agents**: Conversational bots for customer support and lead qualification.
- **AI Avatars**: Lifelike digital representatives for video interactions.
- **RAG Technology**: Retrieval-Augmented Generation for accurate, data-driven responses.
- **Workflow Automation**: End-to-end process automation connecting various business tools.

## Tech Stack
- React (Vite)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion (assumed based on animations)

## Navigation
- / : Landing page
- /admin : Admin dashboard (authenticated)
- /login : Admin login

## Contact
- Website: https://agenticoslabs.com
